name: NurseCare
0:
”Alexa tell Nurse care I need water”
”Alexa tell Nurse care I fell down”
”Alexa tell nurse care I am hungry”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nurse care
Developer Terms of Use
des: Nurse Care helps patients perform their daily tasks with ease. Patients can ask Nurse Care to send water, blanket and other daily needs. Nurse Care connects those requests with care providers and the care providers of the patient help them with their requests. This skill is intended for use on a customer's personal device and also it can be enabled on devices deployed throughout retirement communities
